channel.title: CVE Feed for WPMU DEV -- Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPMU DEV -- Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder

item.title: CVE-2021-36821|2024-08-04T01:01:59.790Z -- wpmu%20dev -- forminator%20%E2%80%93%20contact%20form%2C%20payment%20form%20%26%20custom%20form%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPMU DEV Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Forminator – Contact Form, Payment Form & Custom Form Builder: from n/a through 1.14.11.
